TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StateRuntime extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.IStateRuntime
Public NotInheritable Class StateRuntime Implements IStateRuntime
public ref class StateRuntime sealed : System::Web::SessionState::IStateRuntime

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 状态服务中存储的会话数据。

span.span: Manages session data stored in the ASP.NET state service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持会话状态的进程外使用名为 ASP.NET 状态服务的 Windows 服务来管理的选项。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 此服务中的非托管代码使用类来管理会话数据。The class is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage session data. 此类支持 ASP.NET 状态服务的.NET Framework 基础结构实现，不是预期在代码中直接使用。This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. ASP.NET 状态服务不是 ASP.NET 会话状态管理; 的默认方法默认情况下，ASP.NET 支持会话状态中进程的管理。The ASP.NET state service is not the default method of ASP.NET session-state management; ASP.NET supports an in-process management of session state by default. 它还支持第二个的进程外选项，可管理 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中的会话状态，并使自定义会话状态管理解决方案。It also supports a second out-of-process option that manages session state in a Microsoft SQL Server database and enables custom session-state management solutions. 有关会话状态存储选项的详细信息，请参阅[会话状态模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员支持.NET Framework 基础结构实现的 ASP.NET 状态服务，不是预期在代码中直接使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 有关会话状态存储选项的详细信息，请参阅[会话状态模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 状态服务器用于处理会话数据。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ProcessRequest (IntPtr tracker, int verb, string uri, int exclusive, int timeout, int lockCookieExists, int lockCookie, int contentLength, IntPtr content);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessRequest(native int tracker, int32 verb, string uri, int32 exclusive, int32 timeout, int32 lockCookieExists, int32 lockCookie, int32 contentLength, native int content) cil managed

Public Sub ProcessRequest (tracker As IntPtr, verb As Integer, uri As String, exclusive As Integer, timeout As Integer, lockCookieExists As Integer, lockCookie As Integer, contentLength As Integer, content As IntPtr)
public: virtual void ProcessRequest(IntPtr tracker, int verb, System::String ^ uri, int exclusive, int timeout, int lockCookieExists, int lockCookie, int contentLength, IntPtr content);

param.name: tracker
param.span: 指向存储在非托管 ASP.NET 状态服务器中的某个对象的 指针。

span.span: An pointer to an object stored in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.

param.name: verb
param.span: 要对该对象执行的操作。

span.span: The action to take on the object.
An identifier for the session.

param.name: exclusive
param.span: 存储区中的对象的访问类型。

span.span: The type of access to objects in the store.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 存储会话数据的分钟数。

span.span: The number of minutes the session data is stored.

param.name: lockCookieExists
param.span: 指示在从 ASP.NET Web 服务器到 ASP.NET 状态服务器的原始请求中是否存在锁 Cookie 的值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the lock cookie exists in the original request from the ASP.NET Web server to the ASP.NET state server.

param.name: lockCookie
param.span: 会话状态上的锁的所有者。

span.span: The owner of the lock on the session state.

param.name: contentLength
param.span: 为该会话存储的数据的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length, in bytes, of the data stored for the session.

param.name: content
param.span: 指向非托管 ASP.NET 状态服务器中为该会话存储的内容的 指针。

span.span: An pointer to the content stored for the session in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 状态服务器用于处理会话数据。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持会话状态的进程外使用名为 ASP.NET 状态服务的 Windows 服务来管理的选项。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 此服务中的非托管代码使用方法来管理的会话数据。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage the session data. 此成员支持.NET Framework 基础结构实现的 ASP.NET 状态服务，不是预期在代码中直接使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 有关会话状态存储选项的详细信息，请参阅[会话状态模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

Public Sub ProcessRequest (tracker As IntPtr, verb As Integer, uri As String, exclusive As Integer, extraFlags As Integer, timeout As Integer, lockCookieExists As Integer, lockCookie As Integer, contentLength As Integer, content As IntPtr)

public: virtual void ProcessRequest(IntPtr tracker, int verb, System::String ^ uri, int exclusive, int extraFlags, int timeout, int lockCookieExists, int lockCookie, int contentLength, IntPtr content);

param.name: tracker
param.span: 指向存储在非托管 ASP.NET 状态服务器中的某个对象的 指针。

span.span: An pointer to an object stored in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.

param.name: verb
param.span: 要对该对象执行的操作。

span.span: The action to take on the object.
An identifier for the session.

param.name: exclusive
param.span: 存储区中的对象的访问类型。

span.span: The type of access to objects in the store.

param.name: extraFlags
param.span: 指示当前会话是否为未初始化和无 Cookie 的会话的值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the current session is an uninitialized, cookieless session.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 存储会话数据的分钟数。

span.span: The number of minutes the session data is stored.

param.name: lockCookieExists
param.span: 指示在从 ASP.NET Web 服务器到 ASP.NET 状态服务器的原始请求中是否存在锁 Cookie 的值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the lock cookie exists in the original request from the ASP.NET Web server to the ASP.NET state server.

param.name: lockCookie
param.span: 会话状态上的锁的所有者。

span.span: The owner of the lock on the session state.

param.name: contentLength
param.span: 为该会话存储的数据的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length, in bytes, of the data stored for the session.

param.name: content
param.span: 指向非托管 ASP.NET 状态服务器中为该会话存储的内容的 指针。

span.span: An pointer to the content stored for the session in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 状态服务器用于处理会话数据。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持会话状态的进程外使用名为 ASP.NET 状态服务的 Windows 服务来管理的选项。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 此服务中的非托管代码使用方法来管理的会话数据。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage the session data. 此成员支持.NET Framework 基础结构实现的 ASP.NET 状态服务，不是预期在代码中直接使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 有关会话状态存储选项的详细信息，请参阅[会话状态模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopProcessing() cil managed

summary.span: 停止对存储在 ASP.NET 状态服务器中的会话数据的处理。

span.span: Stops the processing of session data stored in the ASP.NET state server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持会话状态的进程外使用名为 ASP.NET 状态服务的 Windows 服务来管理的选项。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 此服务中的非托管代码使用方法停止处理的会话数据。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to stop processing the session data. 此成员为支持 ASP.NET 状态服务的.NET Framework 基础结构实现提供，不是预期在代码中直接使用。This member is provided to support the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 有关会话状态存储选项的详细信息，请参阅[会话状态模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4)。For more information about session state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0bb0a3a3-650f-4c47-a0c5-b08b9b591bb4).
